amendment.description: An amendment to increase funds for the Native Hawaiian Housing Block Grants program by $13,000,000.

action.text: Mr. Latham raised a point of order against the Hanabusa amendment (A025). Mr. Latham stated that the amendment proposes to increase funds for a program which had not been authorized. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Ms. Hanabusa.
